wb_column_desc: ID of the character or NPC
image of character face for avatar
object ID of in game item
object name of in game item
icon size image of item for bag and menu
name of the level (a level is a map 8x8 - 64x64)
small screenshot of the level to show on selection screen
top view showing map of the level
minimum number of obects to spawn from this spawner
maximum number of obects to spawn from this spawner
number of days before respawn (default 1 = respawn overnight)
the object name of emitter spawned
the vector scale of the emitter
how many milliseconds the effect lasts
small screenshot of the skill to show on toolbar
image the skill (probably in action) to show on selection / learning screen
Effect spawned when the skill is started
Effect spawned when the skill is finished
